description:
Beneath a smooth milk chocolate shell lies layers of crunchy wafers and creamy vanilla protein-packed goodness, these bars taste more like a reward than fuel. Xact nutrition was founded by scientific foodies on a mission to find a tasty alternative to the ubiquitous energy gel

  • 15g of whey protein, 16g of carbs and precise B vitamin complexes to aid in recovery
  • Ingredients: milk chocolate (sugar, cocoa butter, milk powder, cocoa paste, soy lecithin, natural vanilla flavor), whey protein, vegetable oil, coconut oil, milk protein, wheat flour, sugars (fructose), cocoa butter, milk powder, soy lecithin, polyglycerol polyricinoleate (an emulsifier), natural vanilla flavor, guar gum, ammonium bicarbonate, sodium bicarbonate, vitamin mix, stevia extract
  • Allergens – contains: wheat, milk and soy. May contain: almond, hazelnut, sesame and egg
name: Xact Protein Vanilla
